content: {"name": "City Harvest Mobile Market - The Stapleton Mobile Market - Stapleton", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Through our Mobile Market, we distribute free fruits and vegetables, to our community twice each month", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cityharvest.org/programs/mobile-markets/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "75 Hill St", "address_2": "", "city": "Staten Island", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10304", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.632816, "longitude": -74.162819}, "phones": [{"number": "(866) 444-0244", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Eligible if you participate in programs at the Stapleton Houses Senior Center or live in the Berry, Cassidy Coles, New Lane, Richmond Terrace, South Beach,or Stapleton NYCHA Houses or residents of 10301, 10304, 10305, or 10310"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requirements/schedule may change in June"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Recommended to arrive before 10am; people begin lining up at 7am"}]}
